text: Thank you for visiting our website.
news: Camouflage nets are necessary for protection of troops and equipment. With help of The Craft for Saving Lives/Hantverk som räddar liv we produced a camouflage net last Sunday and it is on the way to Ukraine. We continue producing nets today and every Sunday from now on. Please, join! We continue collecting donations at Sveavägen 162, Stockholm, on Sundays from 14:00 - 18:00. Glory to Ukraine!
